title: Higher Meditation
cleaned_text: *All of our tea blends contain either certified organic or ethically-wildcrafted and sustainably sourced herbs.* This Ayurvedic influenced blend has adaptogenic properties which stimulate the thyroid and adrenals to enhance metabolism and overall energy levels. Great as tonic for stress, endurance, strengthening the nervous system, increasing memory and clarity of mind, enhancing and toning the digestive track, and has mild support for the reproductive system. Blended with Tulsi Basil, Gotu Kola,
